overview_of_class:
This course surveys modern Spanish cultural production from 1700 to the present. We will study key literary and cinematic texts and place them in the context of larger aesthetic, social and political trends. Beyond an acquaintance with canonical works, our goal will be to explore how different writers and artists have sought to define the intellectual's role in society and Spain's place in the wider world.
Prerequisites (may be taken concurrently): 220
name: Literature in Spain since 1700
title: WCAS SPANISH 251-0-1 Literature in Spain since 1700
